definitions: the quality of being of a size that is less than normal or usual

examples.text: her delicate smallness was conducive to her career as a dancer
the relative smallness of the screen results in a sharp picture

shortDefinitions: quality of being of size that is less than normal or usual

definitions: the quality of being small in amount or number

examples.text: he expressed astonishment at the smallness of the salaries
the relative smallness of the population

shortDefinitions: quality of being small in amount or number

definitions: the quality of being insignificant or weak

examples.text: we feel our smallness and vulnerability in this vastness

shortDefinitions: quality of being insignificant or weak
